name: Proof_367 — Walking to the Village for Daily Protein MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents a routine yet essential survival activity at MaMeeFarm, recorded on
21 December 2025 at 09:14 AM (GMT+7).

The image shows raw pork purchased from a small village shop after MaMee walked approximately 3 kilometers from the farm. The total cost was 30 THB, intended to serve as the primary protein source for the entire day.

This moment reflects the economic reality of small-scale rural living, where physical distance, human effort, and minimal cash flow are inseparable from daily sustenance. There is no delivery system, no subsidy, and no optimization—only direct human labor exchanged for basic nutrition.

Within the DGCP framework, this proof captures real-world consumption logistics:
movement → purchase → sustenance → continuity of labor.

The act is small in monetary value but significant in context, demonstrating how human survival data is generated quietly, repeatedly, and without institutional recognition, yet remains verifiable and traceable.

The image is recorded as-is, with an embedded timestamp visible, ensuring temporal integrity and continuity within the MaMeeFarm DGCP archive.

This proof is prepared for minting as part of the DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea.
